_comment: Batch generation config. Add prompts and image sources, then run: python batch_preview.py --count 10
user_prompts: Create a website for an Agricultural Engineering Firm called Harvest - Offering cutting-edge engineering solutions for modern agriculture, including irrigation systems, precision farming technologies, and farm automation. We specialize in designing and implementing sustainable and efficient systems. What sets us apart is our innovative approach to integrating technology to enhance agricultural productivity. The design will feature technical diagrams, blueprints, and images of advanced agricultural machinery with a vibrant color scheme.

Create a website for an Organic Fruit Farm called Martinez. A vibrant farm dedicated to growing organic fruits, inviting customers to experience farm-to-table freshness with seasonal produce available year-round.

Create a website for an Art Director Portfolio called Ishikawa. This art director's portfolio demonstrates a mastery of visual communication and a talent for bringing creative visions to life. The portfolio features a diverse range of projects, including advertising campaigns, editorial layouts, and branding initiatives. One standout project, "Midnight Bloom," a perfume campaign, showcases dramatic lighting, sensual imagery, and luxurious textures to create an alluring and sophisticated aesthetic. Another project, "Global Fusion," a multicultural food magazine, features vibrant photography, bold typography, and eclectic layouts to celebrate culinary diversity. The portfolio also includes examples of art direction for film and television, demonstrating a strong understanding of visual storytelling and a passion for creating immersive experiences. Expertise in typography, color theory, and composition ensures that each project is visually stunning and effectively communicates the intended message.

Create a website for a Tennis School called Katsaros. Katsaros offering personalized coaching for all skill levels. Comprehensive tennis lessons, improving your game in a fun environment. What sets us apart is our adaptive training programs, tailored to each player.

Create a website for a Pastry School called Nguyens. Nguyens school is where you bake dreams into reality through our pastry courses. From classic techniques to modern creations, taught by expert chefs. What sets us apart is our focus on innovation, teaching artistry and entrepreneurship

Create a website for a Construction Company called Nanderson Construction. Nanderson Construction specializes in sustainable building practices and innovative design solutions. Our commitment to eco-friendly materials sets us apart, ensuring that every project is not just visually stunning but also environmentally responsible.

Create a website for a Tea Farm called Tanaka. Tanaka is a serene tea farm offering artisanal blends sourced from our own gardens. Our unique selling point is the immersive experience we offer through guided tours and tastings. The design should be tranquil, using soft greens and browns with images of tea leaves and serene landscapes.

Create a website for a Ceramics Studio called Okafor. Okafor operates a dynamic ceramics studio that blends traditional craftsmanship with modern design. Offering classes in wheel-throwing, hand-building, and glazing techniques, the studio welcomes students of all skill levels. Okafor emphasizes creativity and personal expression, encouraging students to explore different styles, from rustic earthenware to sleek contemporary pieces. Their recent exhibition, "Reflections in Clay," showcased intricate glazes and innovative forms that drew inspiration from nature. By selling finished works online, Okafor provides a platform for artisans to reach broader audiences while fostering appreciation for handcrafted ceramics.

Create a website for a Horse Farm called McCarthy - A serene retreat for horse lovers, specializing in breeding, training, and boarding horses while offering riding lessons on stunning trails and open fields.

Create a website for Tech Company called Agire. Innovating the future, one breakthrough at a time. Our tech company specializes in cutting-edge solutions, from AI-driven analytics to next-gen software development. We empower businesses with scalable, secure, and efficient technology designed to transform industries. With a passion for progress and a vision for tomorrow, we merge creativity with technology to drive digital evolution. Explore innovation with us—where abstract ideas become reality.

Create a website for an IP Lawyer. An intellectual property lawyer who specializes in protecting the intellectual property rights of individuals and businesses. They have a deep understanding of patent, trademark, and copyright law. Provides a comprehensive range of services, including patent prosecution, trademark registration, and copyright infringement litigation.

Create a website for an Ice Cream Manufacturer - Crafting artisanal ice cream with unique flavors and high-quality ingredients. We pride ourselves on our creative recipes and sustainable practices. Our value proposition is providing a delicious and memorable ice cream experience. Visual Direction: Bright, playful colors.

Create a website for an Interior Designer. Offers full-service interior design, covering residential and commercial projects. Focuses on creating spaces that reflect the client's personality and needs. Stands out with a collaborative approach and attention to detail. The visual direction is "chic". Elegant design, featuring images of stylish interiors, a neutral color palette with metallic accents, and curated furniture.

Create a website for a Chiropractic School. An innovative chiropractic school offering comprehensive programs that inspire growth and mastery. We create engaging learning experiences for students of all levels. What sets us apart is our curriculum excellence and student success rate. The design should be bright and motivating.

Create a website for a A Cappella Choir. A professional a cappella choir providing expert services with personalized attention and industry-leading expertise. We deliver exceptional results through innovative solutions and client-focused approach. What sets us apart is our commitment to excellence and proven track record. The design should feature clean, trustworthy aesthetics with modern imagery.

Create a website for a Nurse-led Clinic. A caring nurse-led clinic dedicated to improving health and wellbeing through expert care and compassionate service. We provide personalized treatment plans and holistic approaches. What sets us apart is our patient-first philosophy and clinical excellence. The design should be calming with health-focused imagery.

Create a website for a Music Blog. A premier music blog specializing in delivering outstanding service with meticulous attention to detail. We pride ourselves on building lasting relationships through integrity and expertise. What sets us apart is our personalized approach and industry knowledge. The design should be sophisticated and welcoming.

Create a website for a Agricultural Journalist. A trusted agricultural journalist offering comprehensive solutions tailored to meet unique client needs. We combine experience with innovation to exceed expectations. What sets us apart is our dedication to quality and customer satisfaction. The design should be professional with engaging visuals.

Create a website for a Sportswear Store. A distinctive sportswear store featuring exclusive items and outstanding customer service. We bring together the best products for discerning customers. What sets us apart is our taste for quality and commitment to satisfaction. The design should be stylish and user-friendly.

Create a website for a Maternity Clothing Rental Store. A distinctive maternity clothing rental store featuring exclusive items and outstanding customer service. We bring together the best products for discerning customers. What sets us apart is our taste for quality and commitment to satisfaction. The design should be stylish and user-friendly.
